publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4519 Mike Pringle: IKEA Plastic Bag Levy—That the Parliament congratulates IKEA for introducing a plastic bag levy in all its stores across the United Kingdom; notes that this was after a successful two-year pilot at its Edinburgh store following the initial launch of a member’s bill proposal for a levy on plastic bags in Scotland, and calls on other major retailers to introduce similar plastic bag levies.

S2M-4519 Mike Pringle: IKEA Plastic Bag Levy—That the Parliament congratulates IKEA for introducing a plastic bag levy in all its stores across the United Kingdom; notes that this was after a successful two-year pilot at its Edinburgh store following the initial launch of a member’s bill proposal for a levy on plastic bags in Scotland, and calls on other major retailers to introduce similar plastic bag levies.
S2M-4519 IKEA Plastic Bag Levy (lodged on 7 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
